channel.title: What sports/physical activities do you practice?
channel.description:
Personally I do skatboarding and bodybuilding (damn I hate this word, I feel like if I wanted to become a body builder or something, but I only want to get a bit of shape).
In the past I did a bit of Archery but I stopped due to lack of time.
What about you guys and gals?

item.title: What sports/physical activities do you practice?
item.dc:creator: Zsub
item.description:
You know, I actually respect guys who go to the gym to do some bodybuilding. As long as they don’t overdo it =\

I used to row a lot, but I quit that because I didn’t like it. After that I did several years of lazy.

Now I find myself dancing. You know, like ballroom dancing and stuff. I do that three times a week now, the fourth to be coming if I get accepted to my school’s demonstration-team. I also do some generic workout stuff.

Read full topic
item.source: What sports/physical activities do you practice?

item.title: What sports/physical activities do you practice?
item.dc:creator: Kaze
item.description:
I don’t enjoy going to big gyms, it waists time, people don’t wear the proper clothes (undershirt, T-shirt, hoody and pants)

Sorry but when I’m squatting or deadlifting 510lbs I couldn’t care less what you think of my attire. Who seriously wears all that to the gym? I wear a cutoff and basketball shorts and probably get far more done than you do.

/rant, yes mad.

Read full topic
item.source: What sports/physical activities do you practice?

item.title: What sports/physical activities do you practice?
item.dc:creator: Trilby
item.description:
I bike. (Road and a lot) I did weightlifting for about a year, but I stopped this winter. Haven’t done any regular physical stuff since. Laaazzzyy. Ah well, I’m making a summer resolution: I’ll make it up.

Read full topic

item.description:

item.source: What sports/physical activities do you practice?

item.title: What sports/physical activities do you practice?
item.dc:creator: Cup_o_Joe
item.description:
/\ tell that to my triceps!

Anyway, I bike, I do stairs, stretching like pushups, chinups, situps, anything good for my back. I earned gold in Physical Fitness in Cadets when I was 18. I was 6 push ups off from receiving Excellence. I enjoy going to the “Y” sometimes for a day pass to go and swim all I want too. I don’t enjoy going to big gyms, it waists time, people don’t wear the proper clothes (undershirt, T-shirt, hoody and pants), talk too much and many of them don’t get anything done. It’s not a social! If they don’t want to sweat, they shouldn’t be there.

Read full topic

item.title: What sports/physical activities do you practice?
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
Dias:

Cock push-ups.

One is all you need.

I ride my bike to school and back, and to wherever I go other than school.

I used to do basketball and Wu-Shu, a long time ago, and slightly less long ago I did capoeira. Don’t do anything now.
